definitions.text: piece of solid food for dipping in a liquid
a concession given to mollify or placate
examples: the offer was a sop to my feelings

definitions.text: a prescribed procedure to be followed routinely
examples: rote memorization has been the educator's standard operating procedure for centuries

definitions.text: give a conciliatory gift or bribe to
be or become thoroughly soaked or saturated with a liquid
cover with liquid; pour liquid onto
examples: souse water on his hot face
